sentences.en: a primal fear of the unknown
sentences.cn: 对未知事物的本能恐惧

sentences.en: Although the Dream is beautiful, its primal savagery can also be deadly.
sentences.cn: 虽然翡翠梦境是美丽的, 但是它原始的野性也是相当致命的.

sentences.en: Connection with the listener is direct, personal , emotional, primal.
sentences.cn: 这里是介绍广播节目与听众之间的关系,我觉得这几个形容词我叙述起来有困难.请大侠帮忙看看!

sentences.en: Epic crafting items usually require a Primal Nether or two.
sentences.cn: 紫色商业制品一般一两件“原始虚空”材料.

sentences.en: Improved Pounce? Removed and replaced by the new talent Primal Resilience.
sentences.cn: 强化突袭 - 删除被新天赋原始恢复取代.

sentences.en: It is the primitive, primal earth, where the instinctive life heaves up.
sentences.cn: 是在这片原始的土地上, 本能的生命在隆起.

sentences.en: Money was a primal necessity to them.
sentences.cn: 对于他们,钱是主要的需要.

sentences.en: Primal eras before the appearance of life on earth.
sentences.cn: 地球上出现生命之前的原始时代.

sentences.en: Replace lubricating oil after primal 300 hours'operation.
sentences.cn: 在首次运转300小时后换油.

sentences.en: Smell registers in the primal brain, known as the limbic system.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉在最初的大脑, 也就是通常所说的边缘系统登记.

sentences.en: Stars are born from a kind of primal soup known as the interstellar medium.
sentences.cn: 恒星是由一种称为星际介质的“原汤”形成的.

sentences.en: The gunas pass through four stages - gross, subtle, primal and unresolved.
sentences.cn: 19三德要经历粗糙的 、 细微的 、 最初的和尚未发展的四种状态.

sentences.en: The Last of the Mohicans breathes an atmosphere of almost primal innocence.
sentences.cn: 《最后的莫希干人》则散发着一种近乎原始时代天真无邪的纯洁的气息.

sentences.en: The paper uses primal - dual interior point method to acquire the optimal solution.
sentences.cn: 采用原始 — 对偶内点法求解问题的最优解.

sentences.en: The primal wild is a realm of mysteries, especially to the unprepared.
sentences.cn: 原初荒野是个神秘的地方, 尤其是对没准备好的人来说.

sentences.en: Yet some of the most radical ideas about our primal urges have been harnessed by those who want everyone to drink the same brand of beer.
sentences.cn: 然而，那些恨不得人人都喝同一品牌啤酒的守旧派们，则给人类原始冲动中的某些最本质的欲望，套上了枷锁。

words.tran_cn: 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期
初级读本；识字课本；原始物
释放（被压抑的童年情绪）

trans.tran_cn: 第一的，最初的，原始的，首位的，主要的，根本的
trans.tran_en: primal feelings or actions seem to belong to a part of people’s character that is ancient and animal-like
